pkgmetadata.longdescription: # BAIChat API Python## Installation### Pypi``` shellpip install baichat-py```### Codeberg``` shellpip install --index-url https://codeberg.org/api/packages/Bavarder/pypi/simple/ baichat-py```## Usage``` python from baichat_py import Completionprompt = "Hello, world!"for token in Completion.create(prompt): print(token, end="", flush=True) print("")```
